name: Gloo Melter
title: The Cover Destroyer
description: A specialized weapon designed to melt through Gloo Walls and other cover. The Gloo Melter is essential for breaking enemy defenses and forcing them out of position.
weaknesses: Limited damage to players compared to standard weapons
Slower fire rate than assault rifles
tips: Use to destroy Gloo Walls before engaging
Pair with teammates for maximum effectiveness
Best used in coordinated team attacks

name: Shield Gun
title: The Protector
description: A unique weapon that fires protective shields. The Shield Gun provides both offensive and defensive capabilities, making it versatile in various combat situations.
tips: Combine with Gloo Walls for maximum protection
Don't rely solely on this weapon for damage

name: Treatment Laser Gun
title: The Medic's Choice
description: A healing weapon that restores health to teammates. The Treatment Laser Gun is essential for support players who want to keep their team alive during intense battles.
tips: Switch to secondary weapon when needed
Coordinate with team for maximum effectiveness

name: Trogon
title: The Precision Beast
description: A powerful assault rifle with exceptional damage and accuracy. The Trogon is one of the most versatile and reliable weapons in Free Fire, suitable for all combat ranges.
tips: Tap fire for better accuracy at range
Pair with SMG for close range

name: Vsk94
title: The Marksman
description: A semi-automatic sniper rifle with high damage and decent fire rate. The VSK94 bridges the gap between assault rifles and bolt-action snipers.
tips: Aim for headshots for maximum damage
Pair with SMG for close range
Take time between shots for accuracy

name: Fgl-24
title: The Launcher
description: A grenade launcher that fires explosive projectiles. The FGL-24 is devastating against groups of enemies and structures.
tips: Excellent for finishing enemies behind cover

name: M590
title: The Close Quarter Beast
description: A pump-action shotgun with devastating close-range damage. The M590 is deadly in close quarters but loses effectiveness at distance.
tips: Aim for center mass or head
Use in buildings and tight spaces

name: Winchester
title: The Classic
description: A lever-action rifle with high damage and classic design. The Winchester offers good damage at medium range with a moderate fire rate.

name: Rgs50
title: The Rocket Launcher
description: A rocket launcher with massive explosive damage. The RGS50 is devastating but slow to fire and reload.

name: Gatling
title: The Suppressor
description: A heavy machine gun with extremely high fire rate. The Gatling provides suppressive fire but has significant recoil.
tips: Use bipod or crouch for stability

name: Cg15
title: The Battle Rifle
description: A powerful assault rifle with high damage and good range. The CG15 is effective at medium to long ranges.

name: Katana
title: The Blade Master
description: A melee weapon with fast attack speed. The Katana is deadly in close combat and allows for quick silent eliminations.

name: An94
title: The Russian Rifle
description: A powerful assault rifle with a unique two-round burst feature. The AN94 offers high damage and good accuracy.

name: Healing Pistol
title: The Support Sidearm
description: A pistol that can heal teammates. The Healing Pistol provides support capabilities while still being a sidearm.
weaknesses: Lower healing than Treatment Laser Gun

name: Mgl140
title: The Grenade Machine Gun
description: An automatic grenade launcher with high explosive damage. The MGL140 provides sustained explosive firepower.

name: P90
title: The Close Range Specialist
description: A high-capacity SMG with excellent fire rate. The P90 dominates in close-range engagements with its large magazine and fast fire rate.

name: Xm8
title: The Versatile AR
description: A versatile assault rifle with good all-around stats. The XM8 is reliable in various combat situations.

name: M60
title: The Heavy Suppressor
description: A heavy machine gun with high damage and large magazine. The M60 provides sustained suppressive fire.

name: Spas12
title: The Auto Shotgun
description: An automatic shotgun with fast fire rate. The SPAS12 offers rapid close-range devastation.

name: Bat
title: The Melee Classic
description: A basic melee weapon with decent damage. The Bat is a simple but effective close-range option.

name: Svd
title: The Sniper Rifle
description: A semi-automatic sniper rifle with high damage. The SVD is excellent for long-range precision shots.

name: Crossbow
title: The Silent Killer
description: A silent weapon that fires bolts. The Crossbow is perfect for stealth eliminations without alerting enemies.

name: Famas
title: The Burst Rifle
description: A three-round burst assault rifle with high fire rate. The FAMAS excels in close to medium range combat.

name: M500
title: The Powerful Revolver
description: A high-damage revolver pistol. The M500 packs a punch but has limited capacity and slow reload.

name: Mp40
title: The Classic SMG
description: A reliable SMG with good fire rate and mobility. The MP40 is effective in close-range combat.

name: M79
title: The Grenade Launcher
description: A single-shot grenade launcher with explosive damage. The M79 is devastating but slow to reload.

name: Kar98K
title: The Bolt Action Sniper
description: A bolt-action sniper rifle with extremely high damage. The Kar98K is the ultimate long-range weapon.

name: M1873
title: The Wild West Revolver
description: A classic revolver with moderate damage. The M1873 is a reliable early-game sidearm.

name: M249
title: The Machine Gun
description: A light machine gun with large magazine and high fire rate. The M249 provides sustained suppressive fire.

name: Grenade
title: The Explosive
description: A throwable explosive grenade. The Grenade provides area damage and can flush out enemies.

name: M4A1
title: The Classic AR
description: A versatile assault rifle with balanced stats. The M4A1 is one of the most reliable weapons in Free Fire.

name: Ak47
title: The High Damage AR
description: A powerful assault rifle with high damage and recoil. The AK47 rewards skilled players with devastating firepower.

name: Awm
title: The Sniper King
description: A bolt-action sniper rifle with the highest damage. The AWM can eliminate enemies with a single headshot.

name: Sks
title: The Semi-Auto Sniper
description: A semi-automatic sniper rifle with good damage and fire rate. The SKS bridges assault rifles and sniper rifles.
special_features: Better fire rate than bolt actions

name: Groza
title: The Power AR
description: A high-damage assault rifle with good fire rate. The Groza is excellent for aggressive gameplay.

name: M1014
title: The Auto Shotgun
description: An automatic shotgun with rapid fire rate. The M1014 is devastating in close quarters.

name: Ump
title: The Balanced SMG
description: A balanced SMG with good damage and control. The UMP is reliable in close-range combat.

name: Mp5
title: The Classic SMG
description: A reliable SMG with good fire rate. The MP5 is effective in close-range engagements.

name: M14
title: The Battle Rifle
description: A powerful semi-automatic rifle with high damage. The M14 is excellent for medium to long range.

name: Scar
title: The Versatile AR
description: A versatile assault rifle with excellent balance. The SCAR is reliable in various combat situations.

name: Vss
title: The Silent Sniper
description: An integrated sniper rifle with built-in silencer. The VSS is perfect for stealth sniping.

name: Usp
title: The Standard Pistol
description: A reliable semi-automatic pistol. The USP is a balanced sidearm option.

name: G18
title: The Auto Pistol
description: An automatic pistol with high fire rate. The G18 provides rapid firepower in close range.

name: Desert Eagle
title: The Hand Cannon
description: A powerful semi-automatic pistol with high damage. The Desert Eagle is the most powerful pistol in Free Fire.

name: Pan
title: The Melee Pan
description: A melee weapon that can also block shots. The Pan is both offensive and defensive.

name: Parang
title: The Machete
description: A fast melee weapon with good attack speed. The Parang is effective for close combat.

name: M1887
title: The Lever Shotgun
description: A lever-action shotgun with high damage. The M1887 offers powerful close-range shots.

name: Thompson
title: The Classic SMG
description: A classic SMG with high fire rate. The Thompson is effective in close-range combat.

name: Hand-Cannon
title: The Powerful Pistol
description: A high-damage pistol with explosive rounds. The Hand-Cannon packs a serious punch.

name: Plasma
title: The Energy Weapon
description: An energy-based weapon with unique mechanics. The Plasma fires energy projectiles with special effects.

name: M82B
title: The Anti-Material Rifle
description: A powerful sniper rifle that can destroy vehicles. The M82B is devastating against both players and vehicles.

name: Aug
title: The Bullpup AR
description: A bullpup assault rifle with excellent accuracy. The AUG offers great control and precision.

name: Parafal
title: The Battle Rifle
description: A powerful battle rifle with high damage. The Parafal excels at medium to long range.

name: Woodpecker
title: The Marksman Rifle
description: A semi-automatic marksman rifle with good damage. The Woodpecker is effective at medium to long range.

name: Vector
title: The Rapid Fire SMG
description: An SMG with extremely high fire rate. The Vector dominates in close-range combat with its rapid fire.

name: Scythe
title: The Melee Weapon
description: A melee weapon with high damage. The Scythe is deadly in close combat.

name: Mag-7
title: The Compact Shotgun
description: A compact shotgun with good damage and fire rate. The MAG-7 is effective in close quarters.

name: Kord
title: The Heavy Machine Gun
description: A heavy machine gun with massive firepower. The Kord provides devastating suppressive fire.

name: M1917
title: The Classic Revolver
description: A classic revolver with reliable damage. The M1917 is a dependable sidearm option.

name: Usp-2
title: The Enhanced Pistol
description: An enhanced version of the USP pistol with better stats. The USP-2 offers improved performance.

name: Smoke Grenade
title: The Tactical Smoke
description: A throwable smoke grenade that creates cover. The Smoke Grenade is essential for tactical plays.

name: Gloo Wall
title: The Defensive Wall
description: A deployable wall that provides cover. The Gloo Wall is essential for defensive gameplay.

name: Flash Freeze
title: The Cryo Grenade
description: Flash Freeze is a throwable device that creates a temporary ice barrier, slowing enemies and blocking movement.
special_features: Great for zoning and area control
tips: Great for buying time in close fights

name: FF Knife
title: The Tactical Blade
description: A melee weapon designed for quick, silent takedowns and high mobility.
weaknesses: Low damage per hit compared to heavy melee

name: Kingfisher
title: The Precision Rifle
description: The Kingfisher is a fast-firing assault rifle designed for mid-range precision and stability.
weaknesses: Lower damage per shot than heavier ARs

name: Uzi
title: The Pocket SMG
description: A compact SMG with extremely high fire rate, perfect for close-range encounters.
tips: Aim for upper body in close fights

name: Healing Sniper
title: The Support Sniper
description: A unique sniper rifle that heals teammates instead of dealing damage.
tips: Use to support teammates from behind

name: Flamethrower
title: The Fire Breather
description: A close-range weapon that deals continuous fire damage to enemies.

name: MAC10
title: The Stabilized SMG
description: A high fire-rate SMG with built-in silencer and strong stability.

name: AC80
title: The Double-Shot Sniper
description: A precision sniper that deals bonus damage when hitting consecutive shots.

name: G36
title: The Adaptive AR
description: An assault rifle with switchable firing modes for close and long-range combat.
tips: Switch firing modes based on distance
Use auto mode for close range

name: Charge Buster
title: The Charged Shotgun
description: A shotgun that becomes more powerful the longer it is charged before firing.

name: M24
title: The Lightweight Sniper
description: A fast-handling sniper rifle with quick ADS and mobility.
tips: Aim for head for instant kills

name: Bizon
title: The High-Capacity SMG
description: A submachine gun with a large magazine and stable mid-range performance.
